content: आमुच् {c6c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To loosen, let go. {@--2@} To wear, tie round or fasten; put on (as a garment &c.); accoutre with; करोऽयमामुक्तविवाहकौतुकः <ls>Ku. 5. 66</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">7. 21</ls>; आमुंचतीवाभरणं द्वितीयं <ls>R. 13. 21</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 86</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 74</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 25</ls>; <ls>Ki. 11. 15</ls>; आमुंचद्वर्म रत्नाढ्यं <ls>Bk. 17. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To throw, cast, discharge; आमोक्ष्यंते त्वयि कटाक्षान् <ls>Me. 35.</ls> {@--4@} To throw or cast off, take off, put aside (as garments &c.).
